intro: J'ai tellement soif que je ne peux pas bouger.
Est-ce que vous pourriez m'apporter une bouteille d'eau fraîche ?
Je n'arrive jamais à trouver ce que je cherche !
Jack le Louche, propriétaire légitime d'une petite entreprise, à votre "service".
Ou du moins, je le serais si j'avais les fournitures nécessaire.
Apporte-moi un stylo et je te récompenserai généreusement, gamine.
My investment business is in dire straits. I need some property quick or I'll lose everything.
If you help me out, I'll let you have this briefcase and #{font:bold}all#{font:default} its contents.
*Sigh* I wish it wasn't so hard to transport these goods...
I'd be comfortable being a bare bear if only that zoologist kept away...
She keeps staring at me through those binoculars.
Can you find me a shirt to wear?
I would just love a bear-based keepsake!
accept: Let me have that Water Potion!
You got a pen? Great, let's get down to business.
Is that a deed in your hands? I'll trade it for my briefcase and all its contents.
I don't care if the deed is illegitimate, I'll just trade it with an investment bank!
Oh that briefcase would be very useful for carrying my goods...
You brought me a shirt? Thank you!
Oh my archangels! Is that... A bear claw?
I just have to have it!
reward: Now I feel much more organized, thank you.
Let me give you this for your troubles.
thanks: Things are looking up, aren't they?
I'm so organized now, that I'll never lose a thing.
I go everywhere with my briefcase now.
This shirt is starting to tear, but that's OK.
I love bears so much! They're unbearably cute!
